0.title: Technical Lead
0.description_1: Responsible for the Operation Center platform, the main core of the post-purchase experience section. Also collaborated with a team supporting a unified UI component library to improve and centralize frontend development homogeneity regarding components.
0.description_2: Achieved a potential 30% cost reduction in third-party dependent services.

1.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
1.description_1: Responsible for refactoring and updating a platform based on Webpack with Module Federation (micro-frontend), establishing the foundation for migration for different team apps within the company's post-purchase experience ecosystem.
1.description_2: Additionally, improvements were made to a native library that enables orchestration and execution of webpack-react-based apps in the micro-frontend, allowing for resolution and navigation.

2.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
2.description_1: Led a frontend development team for a social network-based platform, providing guidance on best development practices, time management, and planning of sprint activities and short, medium, and long-term goals.
2.description_2: Also supervised best practices and clean code in the frontend, enabling more agile and dynamic development, fostering teamwork and pair programming, and establishing effective communication behaviors. Encouraged the setting of goals and objectives that reduced development times by 30%, achieving the release of the first 2 MVPs efficiently.

3.title: Frontend Engineer => Frontend Lead
3.description_1: Recruited frontend developers and UX/UI designers, ensuring continuity for new developments and features in the app during my time as Technical Lead Frontend. Also developed new features in the frontend app based on VueJS technology, establishing scalability standards for new developments required by the planning team.
3.description_2: Led a migration with the frontend team from the VueJS platform to ReactJS, emphasizing clean code elements to enable scalability, thus reducing platform load times by up to 50%.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.paragraph1: I have 10 years of experience as a software developer and autodidactic enthusiasm. I led FrontEnd development and supervised backend developments as Technical Lead at Cencosud S.A., successfully establishing a non-relational data model for the post-purchase experience sector.
aboutMe.paragraph2: This planning served as a starting point to develop a solid transversal base in micro-frontend technology, which allowed consolidating cost reduction objectives of up to 30% in relation to third-party dependent services, many of which lacked stability and operability affecting the purchasing flow for clients in the company.
